trans-unit.source: Provides methods to convert a WS-Federation message to <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> objects, which are WS-Trust protocol specific.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法，將轉換的 WS-同盟訊息<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>和<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> Ws-trust 通訊協定特定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The new instance serializes WS-Federation messages into WS-Trust Feb 2005 protocol messages; an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005RequestSerializer> class is used to serialize requests and an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005ResponseSerializer> class is used to serialize responses.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體將 WS-同盟訊息序列化 Ws-trust Feb 2005 通訊協定訊息。執行個體<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005RequestSerializer>類別用來序列化要求和執行個體<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005ResponseSerializer>類別用來序列化回應。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005ResponseSerializer> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustFeb2005RequestSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref> class based on the namespace of the response XML.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref>類別，根據的回應 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The request and response messages are serialized based on the namespace of the response XML (the appropriate WS-Trust serializers are used based on the namespace).
trans-unit.target: 要求和回應訊息序列化為基礎的回應 （適當的 Ws-trust 序列化程式會使用根據命名空間） 的 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> opened on the response XML.
reader is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref> class with the specified request and response serializers.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref>與指定的要求和回應序列化程式的類別。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust Serializer to use to read the request (RST).
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取的要求 (RST) 使用的 Ws-trust 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust Serializer to use to write the response (RSTR).
trans-unit.target: 要用來寫入回應 (RSTR) Ws-trust 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: requestSerializer is .
-or- responseSerializer is .

Checks whether the specified string is a wst:RequestSecurityToken message with a namespace that is recognized by the wrapped <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustRequestSerializer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查指定的字串是否為已辨識的命名空間的 wst: requestsecuritytoken 訊息的已包裝<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustRequestSerializer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust message to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的 Ws-trust 訊息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is a valid wst:RequestSecurityToken message with a namespace that matches the WS-Trust protocol that this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref> supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果訊息是有效的 wst: requestsecuritytoken 訊息符合 Ws-trust 通訊協定的命名空間與此<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref>支援; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the specified string is a wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse message with a namespace that is recognized by the wrapped <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustResponseSerializer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查指定的字串是否為 wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse 訊息與已辨識的命名空間的已包裝<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustResponseSerializer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust message to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的 Ws-trust 訊息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is a valid wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse message with a namespace that matches the WS-Trust protocol that this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref> supports; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果訊息是一個有效 wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse 訊息符合 Ws-trust 通訊協定的命名空間與此<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationSerializer"></xref>支援; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts a WS-Federation Sign-In Request message to a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object that the security token service (the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"></xref> class) can consume.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的 WS-同盟登入要求訊息<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>物件的安全性權杖服務 ( <xref href="System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService"> </xref>類別) 可使用。

trans-unit.source: The message to convert.
This should be an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage"></xref>.
The current serialization context.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object that represents the converted Sign-In Request message.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"> </xref>物件，代表轉換後的登入要求訊息。

trans-unit.source: message is null.
-or- context is .
The message is not of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage"></xref>.

-or- The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage"></xref> object is missing required information to construct a valid <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInRequestMessage"> </xref>物件遺失必要的資訊來建構有效<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Converts a WS-Federation Sign-In Response message object to a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: WS-同盟登入回應訊息將物件轉換成<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The message to convert.
This should be an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage"></xref>.
The current serialization context.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object that represents the converted Sign-In Response message.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref>物件，代表轉換後的登入回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: message is .
-or- context is .
The message is not of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage"></xref>.

-or- The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage"></xref> object is missing required information to construct a valid <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SignInResponseMessage"> </xref>物件遺失必要的資訊來建構有效<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the wreq string from a referenced URL.
trans-unit.target: 從參考的 URL 取得 wreq 字串。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to get the wreq string from a reference URL.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，從參考的 URL 取得 wreq 字串。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
The URL of the request data.
The request data from the URL.
Thrown by the default implementation.
Gets the wresult string from a referenced URL.
trans-unit.target: 從參考的 URL 取得 wresult 字串。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to get the wresult string from a reference URL.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，從參考的 URL 取得 wresult 字串。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
The URL of the result data.
The request data from the URL.
Thrown by the default implementation.
Serializes the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object into a string.
trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>物件轉換為字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object to serialize.
The current serialization context.
A serialized string representation of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的字串表示法<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref>物件。

-or- context is .

trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref>物件轉換為字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object to serialize.
The current serialization context.
A serialized string representation of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的字串表示法<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref>物件。
